nodes.text: LMCTS-24542 was a mining survey site built by the Lant Mining Corporation during the Galactic Civil War.

Located in the Brak sector on an airless moon, the station was used to search for valuable materials, but produced little returns for the corporation. Despite this, Lant Mining kept LMCTS-24542 in operation for years, earning it the nickname "Futility Station" from its staff. After upper management learned of the name, the staff was fired  for insubordination and the facility abandoned.

The station was empty until a former employee joined the Rebel Alliance and informed them of the station. Agents located the facility and re-activated it. They stocked it with minimal supplies and it was primarily used as a safehouse for the sector's groups of SpecForce and Alliance Special Operations personnel.
